reviewText:
If you like emotional family drama, this one is for you. I bought it few years back and watched in several times. My special interest is in few songs rendered by "Mukesh". The one which appeared twice in the voice of Lata and Mukesh. Manoj Kumar as hero appeared in movies a long before the release of "Apne Hue Paraye" but probably this one made him a real star.

Mala Sinha is as usual 10/10.
